name: Salary Man Mario
summary:
Mario’s just an everyday salary man, and now’s the time to prove yourself! Bowser has kidnapped your boss, and it’s up to you to rescue him! Do a good enough job, and you might just get a bonus for your trouble!

There are 4 worlds that are immediately selectable from the title screen. There are coins scattered throughout the stages, and when you collect 20 you gain brief invincibility. A new powerup has been added, as well as custom music and enemies/hazards. You don’t immediately go to Small Mario upon getting hit as Fire Mario, and there’s auto scrolling stages as well.
